title: Strictly Come Dancing's Kevin Clifton and Anneka Rice make their way to It Takes Two filming
text:
They're in the middle of gruelling training for Saturday night's live show.

But Strictly Come Dancing's Kevin Clifton and Anneka Rice still found time to flash a smile as they made their way to film spin-off show It Takes Two on Friday.

Professional dancer Kevin, 36, and the TV presenter, 61, cut casual figures as they made their way down the street in London ahead of their interview with Rylan Clark Neal.

Out and about: Strictly Come Dancing's Kevin Clifton and Anneka Rice still found time to flash a smile as they made their way to film spin-off show It Takes Two on Friday

Kevin looked laid-back in a black zip-up jumper, grey joggers and trainers.

While Anneka followed suit in a blue jumper, matching jogging bottoms and black trainers.

The pair both sported rucksacks and bags in which to carry their essentials, though Anneka was seen clutching a gold dress, which she may perhaps wear later in the evening.

Joining Anneka and Kevin were fellow Strictly stars Amy Dowden and Karim Zeroual.

Filming: Professional dancer Kevin, 36, and the TV presenter, 61, cut casual figures as they made their way down the street in London ahead of their interview with Rylan Clark Neal

Casual: Kevin looked laid-back in a black zip-up jumper, grey joggers and trainers. While Anneka followed suit in a blue jumper, matching jogging bottoms and black trainers

Break from training: Anneka carried a bunch of white roses as walked with her professional partner down the street

Giood spirits: Despite weeks of gruelling training, the Strictly stars didn't fail to raise a smile

The duo also looked very causal during their outing, with their pair both carrying luggage into the studio.

Karim was full of the joys as he walked down the street, even stopping to flash a double thumbs up.

Anneka and Kevin's outing comes after she left This Morning hosts Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in stitches when she mistook his mobile phone for his manhood.

Twinkle toes: Kevin was all smiles as he prepared to film It Takes Two with Rylan

Hey guys: Joining Anneka and Kevin were fellow Strictly stars Amy Dowden and Karim Zeroual

Laden with bags: The duo also looked very causal during their outing, with their pair both carrying luggage into the studio

Double the fun: Karim was full of the joys as he walked down the street, even stopping to flash a double thumbs up

Excited: The CBeebies presenter looked delighted as he walked down the street ahead of his TV appearance

During the interview, Anneka was chatting about her progress in the training, after she took to the floor with Kevin for the first time on last month.

She told the presenting duo: 'Two years ago we didn't even think,' before abruptly cutting off to look down at her hand on Kevin's leg.

As she said 'what's that?' the British pro was quick to respond with 'that's my phone,' and the response left them, Phil and Holly in fits of laughter.

Through his tears Phil joked: 'The Strictly curse strikes again!' in reference to Kevin's current romance with his celebrity partner Stacey Dooley.

Kevin added: 'Not again!' before they eventually tried to regain their composure.

Oops! Anneka and Kevin's outing comes after she left This Morning hosts Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in stitches when she mistook his mobile phone for his manhood
description: Professional dancer Kevin, 36, and the TV presenter, 61, cut casual figures as they made their way to film spin-off show It Takes Two on Friday.
